title: U.S. Airstrikes Also Targeted Al-Qaida Offshoot Khorasan
teaser: One terrorist group targeted inside Syria by the U.S. military is a little known al-Qaida offshoot called the Khorasan Group. It was created by al-Qaida leader Ayman al-Zawahiri to take advantage of the crisis in Syria and help al-Qaida achieve its chief goal: level attacks against the U.S. and the West.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
